name: Let's Shrink Ray
description: Let's Shrink Ray tells the story of a slightly mad scientist named Ray, who accidentally exploded the shrink ray he was working on. This explosion made him - and his entire house - drastically shrink to the size of an ant! Ray will have to find the parts of his shrink ray to grow back to his normal size. In order for this to happen, he will have to face off with many dangerous and terrifying enemies...
